attributes.action: Reinstall Cityzap bus service to Leeds after it’s has been axed for reason
attributes.additional_details: It’s good bus service to Leeds than coastliner buses 43 minutes from York on the bus less A64
attributes.background: Reinstating the bus service ZAP to Leeds from York via A1 has been cancelled for good last year

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Bus services are the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You may wish to sign this petition: 

Increase funding available to bus companies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621867
